name: Tic Tac Toe!!!!
description: A simple classic 2-player Tic Tac Toe game for the Apple Watch. You share your Apple Watch with a friend to play. The first person to tap a button is X. The next person to go is O. When X or O connects 3 in a row, a win will be detected and the Apple Watch declares the winner. A reset button is provided at the bottom of the Apple Watch interface to reset the game.
